user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.<COMPLETION_START>Being overweight increases the risk of developing multiple health issues.
Smoking cigarettes increases the likelihood of developing lung cancer.
Climate change is caused by human activity.
Capital punishment does not effectively reduce crime rates.
Men, on average, make more money than women in the same job.
Vaccines do not cause autism.
The death penalty is not always applied fairly.
The United States has a higher incarceration rate than any other country.
Eating meat contributes to greenhouse gas emissions and climate change.
Most car accidents are caused by human error.
Guns do not make people safer.
People with higher levels of education tend to have higher salaries.
The majority of lottery winners end up worse off financially within a few years.
The average American household has more credit card debt than savings.
The use of plastic bags is harmful to the environment.
The vast majority of plastic waste in the ocean comes from just a few countries.
The global population is projected to continue to grow, putting a strain on resources.<COMPLETION_END>
